help: Hello! Here is how you use this stuff:
Run this if I get stuck saying the same thing
Other than that, all you have to do is ping me or DM me
and I'll be right there. Note that I see about 10 messages
into the past when I respond! If you send a message that only
includes my ping, then I will delete it and respond to the
messages before it. It may take a few moments for me to think
